description.narrative: The development impact of IFC''s investment in the Project is expected to be high given that it will: - Improve access to finance for productive micro-entrepreneurs with a strong focus in agribusiness, which will in turn stimulate growth, employment generation and poverty reduction. - As the Company is present in many remote areas in the country, the Project is expected to allow more individuals obtain formal financial services, such as the mobilization of savings and mobile banking.

The proposed project (the Project) aims to provide a senior debt package to PRASAC Microfinance Institution Limited (PRASAC or Company) in order to support its further growth in the market, especially its lending to micro borrowers.

mailing-address.narrative: SIM Senacheert, President and CEO PRASAC Microfinance Institution Limited Building 212, Street 271, Sangkat Tuol Tumpung 2, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia Website: http://www.prasac.com.kh Email: mailto:senacheert@prasac.com.kh Tel: +855 23 22 01 02 Fax: +855 23 21 63 62

name.narrative: The Company is headquartered in Phnom Penh, Cambodia and offers servicers all over the country.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: O-HA - Microfinance and Small Business - Non Commercial Banking
